Text: Decent copy of the movie, but the subtitles suck.

There are decent subtitles @asiatorrents made by Devilbryan1.

However, this is a member site and the uploaders are still hoarding their full HD copy of the movie... I hope someone releases a full hd non-mkv version of the movie.
These subtitles I found is perfect! Includes onscreen text as well: http://subscene.com/subtitles/rurouni-kenshin/english/669480
Any decent non-MKV release of the movie? Last MKV file I downloaded does not allow me to delete the file... Plus MKV files are hard to convert to MP4
